modName: Omegared99 - Gallery of Armor - Guard Armor Replacer
summary:
Replace Omegared99's ESP with this one to give the relevant guards and soldiers the new armor.

Recommended to have a save away from the capitals, certain issue with the gear not changing over if the guards/soldiers are in the scene.
descriptionHtml:
Omegared99 - Gallery of Armor Required.

Replace Omegared99's ESP with this one to give the relevant guards and soldiers the new armor.

Recommended to have a save away from the capitals, certain issue with the gear not changing over if the guards/soldiers are in the scene.

Thanks to Omegared99 for his hard work so far on this mod.


v0.1
- Added Markarth Silverblood armor to Markarth Guards, Cidna Mine Guards and Urzoga gra-Shugurz
- Added Solitude Infantry armor to Solitude/Haafingar Guards and Captain Aldis
- Added Windhelm Steel armor to Windhelm Guards and all Stormcloak Soldiers
- Added Savage Hunter armor to Hunters around Skyrim*

Issues
- I've witnessed a reoccuring problem with Savage Hunter armor transforming into Blades armor, it might be a conflict with another mod I have personally. Please report any issues you come across.
author: Omegared99
